about_the_game:
You Are A Fairy Who Loves Carrots.
Let's go on an adventure today in search of carrots.

Your adventure takes place in a share house where nine girls live.
But for some reason, they hate you very much.
They will surely attack you with a gun when they find you.

You, the little you, hide yourself in the cracks of desks, under beds, and sometimes in very dirty places to find all the carrots without them finding you.

This is a stealth action exploration game starring the "little hater".

Game Features

The World As Seen By A Little Hater
You Are Very Small Compared to the Humans.
Furniture such as desks and bookshelves, and small objects such as books and computers are the perfect size for you to hide from the humans.
You will search for your favorite carrot while hiding in objects that are commonplace to humans.

Simple Yet Versatile Actions

You Are A Fairy With Very High Physical Ability.
You can run around the house using double jumps, wall running, cliff catching, and more.

Implementation Of the Hint Function

We have implemented a hint function to help you find the carrot.
You can search all over the house for the carrot with no hints, or you can rely on hints to find the carrot.

About Video Distribution

・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.
・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

When using a gamepad

・If you click outside of the menu using the mouse, you will no longer be able to operate the menu using only the controller. To restore the ability to operate the menu with the controller, you will need to operate the menu using the mouse only once.
・The default settings for the camera speed are set for gamepad use. If you wish to change the camera speed or other settings, set the desired values from the settings screen.

When using a keyboard and mouse

・The default camera speed settings are intended for use with a gamepad. If you are using a mouse, we recommend that you set the camera speed near the minimum value from the settings screen.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features characters in revealing clothing.
This game does not include any sexual activity.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.4.11
  • Processor: AMD Custom APU 0405
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Custom GPU 0405
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: Fairy Carrots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Stealth action exploration game in which a "little hater" hides in a shared house where nine girls live and runs around looking for carrots.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
